testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.subtitle: Our greatest satisfaction is seeing the happiness of our clients reliving their most precious moments.

1.text: Incredible experience! They captured every emotion of our special day. The photos are works of art we will treasure forever. The attention to detail was exquisite.
1.author: Sophie & Marc

2.text: A truly professional team. They made us feel very comfortable in front of the camera and the final result exceeded all our expectations. Highly recommended.
2.author: Elena & Thomas

3.text: The creativity and passion they put into their work is evident. The photos have magical light and composition. We are in love with our album!
3.author: Isabella & Lucas

cta.title: Ready for a seamless experience?
cta.subtitle: Your peace of mind is just a conversation away.

intro.p1: You are embarking on a journey that should be defined by joy, not anxiety. In Luxembourg's dynamic event landscape, the difference between a chaotic gathering and a transcendent experience lies not in the budget, but in the {{strong}}precision of the planning{{/strong}}.
intro.p2: At WE, we believe that {{em}}peace of mind{{/em}} is the ultimate luxury. This protocol is distilled from over a decade of experience, designed to give you the foresight of a professional. Read it, use it, and reclaim your calm.

foundation.title: 12-18 Months Out: The Foundation
foundation.desc: In Luxembourg, premium locations (chateaux, Moselle estates) are booked well in advance. Do not secure dates before securing the space.

guests.title: The Guest List
guests.desc: Define your numbers now. A "Sage" knows that 150 guests require a different logistical beast than 80.

triad.title: The Vendor Priority Triad
triad.insight: "Who" matters more than "How Much". A vendor who knows the venue's restrictions is worth their weight in gold.

rain.title: The Rain Plan
rain.desc: Luxembourg Reality: Never assume sun. We design for rain so that if it happens, it feels intentional (e.g., clear marquees, cozy indoor lighting).

gap.title: Kirchberg-Moselle Gap
gap.desc: If your ceremony is in the city and reception in the country, provide shuttles. It allows guests to indulge and ensures everyone arrives on {{em}}your{{/em}} timeline.

diet.title: Dietary Dignity
diet.desc: Vegetarian/Vegan options should be as visually stunning as the main menu. A guest treated with care is a guest who raves about your event.

coord.desc: Buying a coordinator is buying your own presence. Be a guest at your own event.

light.desc: Lighting transforms a room more effectively than flowers, for half the cost.

favors.desc: Guests forget "stuff". They remember how they {{em}}felt{{/em}} (Music, Food, Flow).

cta.title: Start Your Journey Well
cta.text: This protocol is the map. But a map is not a guide. To execute a vision of this magnitude requires a partner who watches the horizon while you enjoy the view.

about.title: About Us
about.p1: We are a passionate team of photographers and videographers dedicated to capturing the most precious moments of your life. Based in Luxembourg, we specialize in weddings and special events, bringing years of experience and artistic vision to every project.
about.p2: Our approach combines technical excellence with genuine emotion, ensuring that every photograph and video tells your unique story in the most beautiful way possible.

legal.title: Privacy Policy & Legal Notice
legal.controller_text: Weddings & Events Luxembourg is the controller of your personal data. We are committed to protecting your privacy in accordance with the GDPR.
legal.data_text: We collect information you provide directly to us via our contact forms (Name, Email, Phone, Event Details) for the sole purpose of responding to your inquiry and providing our services.
legal.purpose_text: Your data is used to manage bookings, communicate regarding your event, and issue invoices. We do not sell your data to third parties.
legal.rights_text: You have the right to access, rectify, or request deletion of your data at any time by contacting us at info@welweddingslux.com.
legal.image_rights_text: Weddings & Events Luxembourg acts exclusively as a technical service provider for image capture. The Client is solely responsible for informing their guests and obtaining the necessary consent for image capture and dissemination, in accordance with applicable laws in Luxembourg. The Client explicitly releases Weddings & Events from any liability or third-party claims related to image rights.
legal.disclaimer: This website is provided for informational purposes. While we strive for accuracy, we cannot guarantee the completeness of the information.
